sentences.en: It is a flagellum – the tail - like propeller found in single cells.
sentences.cn: 它是一根鞭子—— 状 似螺旋桨的尾巴存在于单个细胞中.

sentences.en: Resembling or having the form of a flagellum ; whip like.
sentences.cn: 有鞭毛、鞭节的,或类似于鞭毛、鞭节的.

sentences.en: Strictly the term is now reserved for the bacterial flagellum.
sentences.cn: 目前该术语专用于细菌鞭毛.

sentences.en: That vibration can then be coupled to another structure to turn a rotor, which in turn operates a flagellum-like tail.
sentences.cn: 这个颤动能够随即作用到另一个装置以启动马达，后者接着操纵像鞭毛一样的尾巴。

sentences.en: The Leifson staining method is a common method of the flagellum staining of bacteria.
sentences.cn: 赖夫生染色法是细菌鞭毛染色的一种常用方法.

sentences.en: Thefinal evolution of the flagellum might then have involved only thenovel recombination of sophisticated parts that initially evolved forother purposes.
sentences.cn: 鞭毛的最终出现，可能仅仅来自本来向其它方向进化的复杂器官的重新组合。

sentences.en: They have a whiplike structure called a flagellum.
sentences.cn: 它们有像鞭子一样鞭毛结构.

sentences.en: Using special stains, one can see that some bacteria have attached to them wavy-looking “hairs” called flagella. Others have only one flagellum.
sentences.cn: 用特殊的着色剂后，你会发现有的细菌上长着不少波状的"毛发"即鞭毛，而有的细菌只有一根鞭毛。

words.tran_cn: 鞭状的；[生物] 有鞭毛的
生有鞭毛的；生有匍匐茎的

trans.tran_en: a long whiplike outgrowth from a cell that acts as an organ of locomotion: occurs in some protozoans, gametes, spores, etc
